metadata.title: CVE-2017-5455 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The internal feed reader APIs that crossed the sandbox barrier allowed fora sandbox escape and escalation of privilege if combined with anothervulnerability that resulted in remote code execution inside the sandboxedprocess. This vulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 52.1 and Firefox < 53.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5455` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '53.0+build6-0ubuntu0.16.04.1').
